text: Richard Thorp (2 January 1932 - 22 May 2013) was an English actor. He was best known for playing the part of Alan Turner in Emmerdale from 1982â€“2013. He also appeared in several movies, including The Dam Busters (1955) and The Barrets of Wimpole Street (1957). Thorp was born on 2 January 1932 in Croydon, Surrey, England. He took a break from Emmerdale in July 2009 to have his right knee replaced. . He died on 22 May 2013 in Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, aged 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Surrey Category:People from Croydon Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: Richard Thorp
